devdoc.author: MasterDevv
devdoc.details: Extension of {ERC20} that allows flash lending.

allowContract(address,bool).details: Admin can add or remove contracts to the whitelist.

params.addr: contract address that you'll add or remove in whitelist.

approveContract(address,address,bool,uin.details: This function will enable or disable the whitelisted contracts to transfer or withdraw user's vault shares. EIP712 hashing and signing method.

params.feeRate_: The percentage of the loan `amount` that needs to be repaid, in addition to `amount`.

deposit(address,uint256).details: User deposits any ERC20 tokens into vault and get vault shares.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Admin can call this function to do emergency withdraw any ERC20 tokens when the vault is paused.

flashFee(address,uint256).details: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Loan `amount` tokens to `receiver`, and takes it back plus a `flashFee` after the callback.

params.data: A data parameter to be passed on to the `receiver` for any custom use.
params.receiver: The contract receiving the tokens, needs to implement the `onFlashLoan(address user, uint256 amount, uint256 fee, bytes calldata)` interface.

maxFlashLoan(address).details: The amount of currency available to be lent.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPause(bool).details: Admin can pause/unpause all the above main functions.

toShare(address,uint256).details: Helper view function that represents an amount of token in shares.

toUnderlying(address,uint256).details: Helper view function that represents shares back into the token amount

transfer(address,address,address,uint256.details: Transfer Function to transfer vault shares from one to another. Note This function can be called by user and user-approved contracts.

params.share: A amount of vault share to transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCode(address).details: This contract is using UUPS proxy pattern and admin can upgrade using updateCode function.

updateFlashloanfeeRate(uint256).details: Admin can update the flashLoanfeeRate using this.

withdraw(address,address).details: User withdraws the underlying tokens with vault shares. Note This function can be called by user and user-approved contracts.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: In other words, User should be send to Vault Contract.
